statements: SELECT * FROM assessments
SELECT assessment_name, total_score FROM assessments WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name FROM assessments ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT COUNT(assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM assessments
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY total_score DESC, submission_date ASC;
SELECT assessment_name, total_score FROM assessments WHERE assessment_id > 5 AND submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT assessment_id, user_id, assessment_name, total_score, submission_date FROM assessments WHERE total_score > 90;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM assessments WHERE total_score < 70 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assessments, user_id FROM assessments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_assessments > 3 ORDER BY total_assessments DESC;
SELECT * FROM results WHERE score > 80
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_name DESC
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM results GROUP BY student_id
SELECT quiz_id, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions IN (10, 15, 20)
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM results
SELECT * FROM results WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM results WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT r.student_id, q.quiz_name, r.score FROM results r JOIN quizzes q ON r.quiz_id = q.quiz_id ORDER BY r.score DESC;
SELECT q.quiz_name, COUNT(r.id) AS total_attempts FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN results r ON q.quiz_id = r.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_name;
SELECT r.quiz_id, q.quiz_name, AVG(r.score) AS avg_score FROM results r JOIN quizzes q ON r.quiz_id = q.quiz_id GROUP BY r.quiz_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, total_questions FROM assessments;
SELECT student_id, assessment_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT assessment_name, total_questions, time_limit FROM assessments ORDER BY time_limit DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_name DESC, total_questions ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT assessment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM assessments JOIN quiz_results ON assessments.assessment_id = quiz_results.assessment_id GROUP BY assessment_name ORDER BY total_results DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';

SELECT assessments.assessment_name, quiz_results.score FROM assessments JOIN quiz_results ON assessments.assessment_id = quiz_results.assessment_id WHERE quiz_results.score >= 80 ORDER BY quiz_results.score DESC;

SELECT student_name, COUNT(DISTINCT quiz_results.assessment_id) AS total_assessments_completed FROM students JOIN quiz_results ON students.student_id = quiz_results.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_assessments_completed > 3 ORDER BY total_assessments_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments;
SELECT title, start_date, end_date FROM assessments;
SELECT id, name, email FROM students;
SELECT id, question_text FROM questions;
SELECT id, student_id, score, submission_date FROM quiz_results;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM questions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM assessments WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quiz_results WHERE score >= 70.5 ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT quiz_title, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM questions WHERE quiz_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY question_id;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, score FROM students JOIN results ON students.student_id = results.student_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM results ORDER BY submission_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT quiz_title, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_duration > '1 hour'
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01'
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM questions WHERE question_id IN (SELECT question_id FROM answers WHERE is_correct = TRUE)
SELECT quiz_title, student_name, score FROM quizzes INNER JOIN results ON quizzes.quiz_id = results.quiz_id INNER JOIN students ON results.student_id = students.student_id ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5
